3-5 keywords that describe your brand vi: Playful - lighthearted, joyful, curious and irresistibly endearing; Heartfelt - warmth, empathy, and authenticity; Hopeful - positive, optimistic and uplifting; Creative - imaginative, full of personality, a bit quirky / cheeky - equal parts imagination + knowledge; Trustworthy - transparent, accountable and committed to our mission — even if our tone is playful
Current Brand Fonts: Blogger Sans Bold, Medium, Regular, Light; NOTE: Considering a shift in font for everything except the logo. Interested to get your thoughts in some options (will pull together shortlist).
